description: Hasura dashboards for HTTP GraphQL requests

panels.description: P95 latency of GraphQL Query requests
panels.title: Query Latency (P95)

panels.description: P95 latency of GraphQL Mutation requests
panels.title: Mutation Latency (P95)

targets.expr: topk(10, 1 - (sum by (job,operation_type, operation_name, parameterized_query_hash) (rate(hasura_graphql_requests_total{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance",operation_name=~"$operation_name",parameterized_query_hash=~"$query_hash",response_status="success"}[$__range])) / sum by (job,operation_type, operation_name, parameterized_query_hash) (rate(hasura_graphql_requests_total{job=~"$job",instance=~"$instance",operation_name=~"$operation_name",parameterized_query_hash=~"$query_hash"}[$__range]))))  > 0

panels.title: Query Request Rate

panels.title: Mutation Request Rate

panels.title: Query Error Rate

panels.description: The Error rate of GraphQL Query requests
panels.title: Mutation Error Rate

panels.title: Query Latency (P95)

panels.title: Mutation Latency (P95)

panels.title: HTTP Connections

panels.title: Cache Request Rate

panels.title: Action Data Transfer

title: Hasura HTTP GraphQL
